name: Hair Shampoo & Conditioner Bar with Bamboo Holder Set
about: What it is: A set that includes the all-natural shampoo and conditioner bars and 2 sustainable bamboo holders...Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Concerns:.- Dryness.- Damage/Split Ends/Breakage.- Oily Scalp..Key Benefits:.- Helps Moisturize, Strengthen, and Rejuvenate..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Longsheng Rice Water: Nourishes and repairs..- Cocoa Butter: Conditions, softens, and moisturizes..- Hydrolyzed Rice Protein: Increases volume, shine, and strength...Ingredient Callouts: These products are vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and come in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Viori's mission is to create safe, natural, highly effective products that honor the values and traditions of the Red Yao women. All Viori products are 100 percent vegan, plastic-free, pH balanced, and cruelty-free, as well as sustainably and ethically sourced, and made without sulfates, parabens, or phthalates...For over 2,000 years, the Red Yao tribe in the rice-terraced mountains of Longsheng have been famous for their near-perfect hair. The tribe women have passed down their unique, natural method of maintaining long, strong, healthy hair with nutrient-rich Longsheng riceu2122 water...Viori has created a long-term, sustainable partnership with the Red Yao women. They work with them personally to purchase their rice at a premium and utilize the ingredients and techniques theyu2019ve developed over centuries into Viori hair care products. In addition, at least five percent of Viori's profits go directly to the tribe for projects they believe will help their communities thrive...Fragrance Description: Citrus Yao is a fresh, citrus-scented bar reminiscent of a Red Yao fruit basket. Terrance Garden is a natural, green, floral-scented bar reminiscent of wandering the bamboo trails of the Longsheng mountains. Hidden Waterfall is a sweet, vanilla-scented bar reminiscent of the amber aroma found along the forested paths to hidden Longsheng waterfalls. Native Essence is a raw, natural, unscented bar, crafted with the same Longsheng rice water as all Viori bars...This Set Contains:.- 0.12 oz/ 3.95 g Hair Shampoo Bar.- 0.80 oz/ 2.8 g Hair Conditioner Bar.- 3.10 oz/ 0.09 g Hair Shampoo Bar Bamboo Holder.- 3.10 oz/ 0.09 g Hair Conditioner Bar Bamboo Holder..Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Longsheng Rice Water: Nourishes and repairs..-Cocoa Butter: Conditions, softens, and moisturizes..-Hydrolyzed Rice Protein: Increases volume, shine, and strength...Shampoo Bar:.Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Cetyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Coconut Acid, Oryza Sativa (Longsheng Rice) Water, Theobroma Cacao Seed Butter, Stearic Acid, Sodium Isethionate, Water/Aqua/Eau, Sodium Lactate, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Wax, Bambusa Arundinacea Stem Extract, Brassica Oleracea Italica Seed Oil, Calcium Pantothenate, Inositol, Oryza Sativa Bran Oil, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Tocopheryl Acetate, Oryza Sativa Flour, Lactobacillus/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Citrus Aurantifolia Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Peel Oil, Citrus Limon Peel Oil, Citrus Paradisi Peel Oil, Fragrance/Parfum, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia Peel Oil...Conditioner Bar: .Cetyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Theobroma Cacao Seed Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Oryza Sativa (Longsheng Rice) Water, Stearic Acid, Bambusa Arundinacea Stem Extract, Brassica Oleracea Italica Seed Oil, Calcium Pantothenate, Inositol, Oryza Sativa Bran Oil, Water/Aqua/Eau, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Tocopheryl Acetate, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Wax, Oryza Sativa Flour, Lactobacillus/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantifolia Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Peel Oil, Citrus Limon Peel Oil, Citrus Paradisi Peel Oil, Fragrance/Parfum......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.

reviews.review_title: Must have in my hair care routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just restocked this product and absolutely love it! My hair feels so healthy and strong; it doesnu2019t get oily as fast but still maintains its shine. These are super easy to travel with as well so I never need to compromise on quality or switch back n forth between product brands

reviews.review_title: So far Iu2019m loving it! Wish the smell would last.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smell is fantastic, but I donu2019t notice it in my hair after rinsing. Surprisingly, my thin hair felt thicker and stronger after just one wash. The bar lathers easily, but I make sure to thoroughly wet my hair before shampooing. I rub it in my hand for a second or two and then directly apply it to my hair. Keep in mind that you may need more water when using shampoo bars compared to liquid shampoos to achieve the same lather effect. The conditioner takes a bit longer to penetrate, but it works wonders if you let it sit for 3-5 minutes. These bars are more convenient for the gym than travel bottles. I allow them to dry slightly before placing them back in the bamboo steamer baskets. I donu2019t keep them in the showeru2014more of a carrying case. Let your bar dry while you get ready, and then store it in the case. If you prefer a shower holder or a wet case, donu2019t use the one that comes with the bar.

reviews.review_title: Need to continue using for results
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this product switching between viori and regular shampoo. I like it I bought it for my mom and sister. My sister has curly hair and she asked for more as she says she noticed her hair grew and she noticed a difference.grew  growing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using Viori for the first time, I thought I was going to love it. I ran a comb through my hair and there werenu2019t any tangles.  However, after using a second or third and a fourth time, it did not live up to that same hype. Second day hair looks greasie.  The shampoo lathers well enough but I agree with not being able to tell if enough product is being used for the conditioner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this product over a year ago and have adored it ever since. The scent is gentle and clean. I love the bamboo holder it comes in. The shampoo lasted about a year using 1-2 times a week.  Since using this, I have discarded all my bottle shampoos.   I recommend using in warm, not hot, water.   The conditioner leaves my hair very soft!  My hair type:  Natural strawberry blonde redhead.  Length: Long.  Curl Type: 2c-3a with 4a at the base of my neck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It literally MOLDED. The bamboo container and the shampoo and conditioner. I got maybe 4-5 uses. Disgusting

reviews.review_text: This is not only a lovely product, but it is very effective! My hair is softer since I have been using it. I love the fact that I no longer have to squeeze bottles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so in love with this product. My scalp had been bothering me for months and this has saved me. I love the very subtle scent. My hair is ultra short and this keeps it clean and quick to style.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super cute, I should buy the one for oily hair or all hair type since the one for dry hair makes my hair oily for just one day, still a great product and the bar form made the process fun

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product delivers,it leaves your hair feeling soft and feeling extremely manageable. The scent is soft , not overpowering.

reviews.review_title: Keep the price, faithful forever customer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product 4 years or more. I don't change shampoo from this. I was always trying the latest salon shampoo and conditioner but they were just expensive and basic to me. This shampoo and conditioner keeps my hair from breaking(about 16-20 hairs per wash fall off), my hair has a softer texture, it doesn't dry out my hair, I love the lather. I have very thick 2b/3a hair. At one point before this shampoo my hair felt thinner, now my hair is thicker than ever. My routine is to wash my hair weekly and I use a scalp massager everytime, condition your hair, and let sit minimum 5 minutes before rinsing well;sure does make a difference. Brush your hair daily and sleep with a microfiber bonnet,you'll be doing your hair a favor .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Used for 2 months and it has completely dried out my hair to the point where there was so much breakage I had to cut 3 inches off today (which is sad as I bought this because of the great reviews promoting hair growth!)

reviews.review_title: Smells heavenly not enough moisture for thick hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this. The first time I used it my hair felt so soft from the conditioner bar and it smelled amazing. Every time I used it after the initial try my hair just felt dry. Not enough moisture for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have thin wavy/curly hair and frequently use hair spray, mousses, oils, creams, gel, dry shampoo, etc.. to style my hair and was looking for a more environmental product to wash it. Used it a few times before making my review which is this: The shampoo bar builds a very good lather but itu2019s hard to tell if youu2019ve used the conditioner bar ENOUGH for it to help your hair. In the shower, my hair felt clean, and immediately after my hair felt very light, HOWEVER the next day my hair looked sooooo greasy and felt stiff and it tangled severely. I had multiple sections of hair clumping together in a bad way, hence the tangles. So I think this MIGHT be a better fit for people who do NOT use a lot of product to style their hair. Itu2019s not advertised as u201cclarifyingu201d or anything, so I wouldnu2019t say itu2019s a bad product, just not what I need.   The scent is weird as well. I think the bamboo holder infused a wooden plank smell into the bars, so I felt like I had sawdust on me. Gonna try to return!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a travel size of this from a beauty box I subscribe to and loved it enough to buy the full bars. I have a lot of curly/wavy hair and live in high humidity area and this has been great. I can go 3-5 between washes with this and my hair stays looking nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got fine long grey hair and this shampoo and conditioner are absolutely amazing, I buy it many time and will buy more

reviews.review_title: A must for gray fragile hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This made my gray hair so heathy looking and very soft. I do not need hair conditioner because just the shampoo is enough. I had put a leave in conditioner and made my hair look greasy. I was going to try the hair conditioner but I will just stick with the shampoo bar.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The shampoo left my hair dry after a couple of issues and the conditioner alone is great. However the storage is horrible not even a month and it got full of mold. Had to return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Works wonders for my hair even though its damaged and colour treated! I have tried the scented ones itu2019s not the same !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I keep this kit in rotation and use it when my hair needs a light wash and relaxed style. It does require more work with lathering but itu2019s worth it IMO. The conditioner makes my hair so soft !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased this set in hopes of finding a more environmentally friendly option, but it just left my hair oily & smelling weird. I never felt like my hair was ever clean. I tried using it without the conditioner & it was still an oily mess

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product. My hair feels better that ever & knowing that itu2019s eco friendly is a major plus. Only downside is my bamboo holder started to grow mold! Hence the 4/5 stars. Hoping they can figure out a solution to that issue!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve only been using this product for about two weeks now, and Iu2019m obsessed! I wanted to find a shampoo and conditioner bar to be more sustainable, and, to be honest, I didnu2019t have high hopes. But Iu2019m amazed! I love these so much - I will definitely be repurchasing when they run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: We LOVE this!! Hair feels and smells great. My daughter has Thick, wavy hair and uses this product. We have purchased this 3 times!
Made my hair really dry and brittle, I was really hopeful with that product but it did not work for me.   It did made me feel my hair really clean but it sickest all the moisture out of my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Enjoyed the product and its effects. Pleasant smell and washes the hair well and leaves it feeling clean. However, they should be a lot more clear about the proper storage for the product. I am from a more humid environment, which may contribute, but within two months of using the holder it has already began to mold. Tried to fix it with hydrogen peroxide which may work for anyone else but not sure if I want to continue using it. Itu2019s best not to store in your bathroom but thatu2019s rather inconvenient.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So impressed. I've tried to use other bars before and they left me feeling like straw with waxy ends. This stuff is awesome! The conditioner has SLIP! It's a little awkward to get used to. Dries beautifully! The only issue is the scent but it doesn't linger too long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I brought this to our RV park for the last summer.  One thing I really liked was that it is compact.  There are no bottles to store.  Our RV bathroom has  a shower but there is just so much room. My hisshusbas and son have their own shampoo and conditioners.  This one has saved me space.  It also makes my hair soft and shiny and smooth

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently purchased Viori shampoo set, and it was a waste of money. I only used it twice, because it made my scalp very dry and itchy, and my hair started falling out when using the conditioner.

reviews.review_title: Smells like the perfume section of a Sephora store
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overwhelming cologne-like synthetic fragrance which was unexpected and unnecessary. Not sure how this is considered u201ccleanu201d without identifying the source of the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Never used a worse shampoo, when washing your hair feels stripped of all oils and your scalp feels really clean, but then when you dry your hair it feels like there is some sort of a film over your hair. My hair is greasy within hours of washing my hair with this shampoo. Usually I wash my hair every 2nd or 3d day but with this shampoo I would have to wash my hair every ten hours. I have normal to oily straight hair for reference Also if you go on their website they constantly run 40% off promotions

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this for two weeks now and I do prefer this to the shampoo and conditioner, I was regularly using. My hair is cleaner for longer. Only thing to note, bamboo holder is not water treated it needs to be placed somewhere dry in-between use

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent, the packaging, the results- WOW. Iu2019ve been skeptical of shampoo & conditioner bars before trying this combo. Itu2019s incredible. Itu2019s easier. The results are stunning and you donu2019t have big bottles to recycle which most likely end up in a landfill anyways. Iu2019m so happy with this product!! Try it yourself today!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The shampoo and conditioner bars are wonderful at first. They lather well for a bar and did a good job cleaning. However the holder went moldy very quickly and the shampoo bar has started to crumble and is unusable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After keeping this item unused for a while due to mixed reviews, I resolved issues with the holders and must admit, I now genuinely enjoy using this product. While it may not be suitable for everyone, as it requires more time to wash your hair, the results make it worthwhile. Take care to prevent mold by curing the containers and avoid placing it on the shower side with the shower head u2013 opt for the opposite end.

reviews.review_title: Best hair care product on the market.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product!!! I didnu2019t think I would like the bar but I do!!!! My hair does better than it ever has.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have had this item waiting to be used.  It was because of some of the reviews.  I finally cured my holders and I have to say, I actually loved this product.  Is it for everyone, it definitely takes more time to wash your hair; however it is worth it.  I spend way more times on my makeup.  Cure the containers this will prevent the mold and do not place it afterwards on the shower side but the end of your shower that does not have shower head on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using it for over the past 2 months I still donu2019t like it at all, it takes for ever to do any bubble, so I end up spending more water them with any liquid shampoo. The smell is nice, not too strong. My hair feel dryer than normal, and the shine that it issued to have it also gone, I insisted for over a month cus I thought it might take some time, but I am definitely going back to liquid

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had never tried bar shampoo or conditioner, and actually loved these. I found the shampoo bar to be very moisturizing too. If I purchased again I would probably just purchase the shampoo bar.

reviews.review_title: A Must have to save $ and the planet
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product! My hair is thicker and fluffier than before. My basket started getting moldy when I didnu2019t let it sit by the window so Iu2019d recommend doing that! Great for the environment:).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My bar and storage box molded. It was very disappointing and very disgusting. It was very expensive to do this.

reviews.review_title: Shampoo is very stripping, tangled my hair.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Shampoo strips the heck out of your hair. I don't think I've ever used something that felt so drying and stripping on my hair and my hair is normally super oily. It felt so drying on my scalp my hair was getting tangled in the shower which never happens to me. It made my hair get greasy the same night I'm assuming because it stripped my scalp so much my oils over compensated? idk it was weird. The conditioner bar was a little hard to use, it did slip out of my hands a couple times lol But it made my ends so soft, which surprised me. I would possibly buy just the conditioner in the future but the shampoo was a NO for me. The set came with only one lid so you can stack the bamboo containers on top of each other but I don't understand how the bar on the very bottom would stay dry as the water from the bar on top would drain onto it? It should come with two lids so you can keep them separated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair
reviews.review_text: definitely takes a while to get used to but itu2019s worth it! makes my hair feel so nice and soft, plus I notice my hair doesnu2019t get oily as fast as it usually does with regular shampoos!

reviews.review_title: Created a Lot of Hair Breakage/Fall
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff smelled amazing, but after long term use, my hair started to have a lot breakage/falling out. Switched off of it and my hair returned to normal. I also felt like it never really broke down my scalp oil, but I am prone to oily hair. Not sure if it's relevant, but I bought the product straight from the Viori website, not from Sephora.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These bars are amazing. They leave my hair feeling so soft, shiny, and smooth. Doesnu2019t dry out my scalp, and controls frizz. I get so many compliments on how my hair looks. I try other things but always go back to Viori.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells good and everything but every time I use it I have so many fall outs. I loose so much hair when I use it. I tried to use it again but I had to stop cuz it keeps happening. I donu2019t recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am super surprised how much I like these bars. I bought the Terrace Garden scent because I have curly hair that tends toward dryness and this one is unbelievably moisturizing without being greasy. I wanted something easy for travel, but honestly I think once I'm done with my existing liquid shampoo and conditioner I am going to make the switch to using these all the time, they are that good. Pros: beautiful fresh floral scent, good for the environment, and honestly my scalp and hair just love these. I've had no problem getting enough lather with the shampoo nor have I had any issues with the conditioner. You just have to park your expactations for what a shampoo and conditioner ought to feel like, because it is a bit different, but in this case different is so much better! Some people have spoken about more hair loss or irritation, but I haven't encountered any of these issues. In fact I would say my scalp feels less dry and itchy than usual, which is a good thing. The only con, which I'm totally willing to live with, it that they are a bit messy to keep in the shower. I don't use the bamboo holder, instead I just use plastic soap holders, but like with regular bar soap it just gets a bit messy and gooey and then I periodically have to clean the containers. But again, I consider this to be minor because I'm not hosting any fancy galas in my shower. All in all, really glad I tried these and I'll be using them more than I thought I would be.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It takes a while to lather up, but once it does it really dried my hair out. I also noticed that after conditioning, I was losing so much hair!! It smells great but definitely will not be purchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I color my hair black, I noticed while washing my hair with the shampoo bar that it was washing the color out. I could see the black in the water while I showered.  It also doesnu2019t lather well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wash my hair 2-3 a week. This product has reduced how oily my hair was. This also lasted me 5 MONTHS. Iu2019ve tried many shampoo bars and this one leaves my hair so hydrated and healthy, not dried out. I LOVE!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lather : 5/5. -- Removes dirt: 4/5 (might strip too much tho) -- Sustainability : 5/5. After usage i let the product air out to prevent mold. -- Scent : 5/5. Citrus is quite powerful but the scent is significantly reduced when you wash, and thus leaves a soft & refreshing citrus scent -- Overall : 4.5/5. I've seen improvement on my hair. Usually i have to wash my head every 1-2 days. With Viori it's 2-3 and i like how i don't get as oily as before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for the last month, after having my eye on it for a while I finally took the plunge after using Redken for the last 3 years. I am so heart broken as it has made my hair fall out in large amounts. The typical amount of hair fall out during my shower has quadrupled from what it used to be. I have obviously discontinued using. The smell is good and I love the idea of not using a bunch of plastic, but Iu2019ve been trying to get my hair to grow long and healthy for years now and this has set me back so much. Iu2019m glad it works for so many people, I am just one of the few it does not work for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Shocked by all the positive reviews.  The shampoo is a pain to lather had to wash my hair three times.  This is definitely not for oily hair and also had absolutely no impact on postpartum hair loss.  Iaddaddaddition to

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I usually wash my hair about once a week. I love this product so much. It is simple. It makes my hair feel clean and soft. I have medium thickness, extremely fine hair, and it does not weigh it down at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought the set and it did not really meet my expectations. I can appreciate the environmental footprint, saving the planet but these bars fall short in my opinion. Maybe it's because I have very long thick hair that tangles easy. The shampoo bar did lather well but it took awhile to get there and it left my hair feeling very dry. The conditioning bar didn't do too much. I think it's just not enough for my length and thickness of hair. It did smell good and I love the woven basket case.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using Lush solid shampoo bars for years and I have to say after a single use this is my new favourite shampoo!!  Often with natural shampoos my scalp feels either too clean or as if there is residual oil. This shampoo made my scalp feel clean yet nourished! Normally when I wash my hair I have a fist full of fallout/breakage but this time I had - no joke - only 4 strands of hair fallout!! Iu2019m SHOCKED, Iu2019ve never had such little fallout with a product before!  Iu2019ve knocked off a star because I wasnu2019t as blown away with the conditioner as I was with the shampoo. Once dried my hair feels super soft and shiny but got a little frizzy without using additional oils/products. The container is cute but very cheaply made (arrived with the top hand broken).  I recommend saving some money by only buying the shampoo without the conditioner or holder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little worried the shampoo would be too drying and the conditioner would weigh down my fine hair but Iu2019m honestly obsessed with how good my hair feels. The only thing is Iu2019m not sure how shower safe the bamboo holder is but the shampoo and conditioner are a 12/10 for me

It isnu2019t the worst hair care Iu2019ve ever used, but it could certainly be better.  Shampoo: 3.5/5 Pretty decent. It works, but I found that it builds up into my hair and has made my dandruff more prominent. I have to wash my hair a day sooner than usual. I can go usually up to 3 days without washing but this usually shortens it to 2 unless I use dry shampoo. I have fine hair. My boyfriend does not care much for it but it works and heu2019ll use it still. It caused him buildup and bad dandruff, he has 3A curly hair. Smell is pleasant at least.   Conditioner: 2/5 Not a fan. I tried avoiding my roots and focused on the length with it. I like the sheen it gives my hair but it makes my hair flat if I put I anywhere near my scalp, so either way I have to use a different conditioner for my scalp. Makes it not an effective conditioner for me. My boyfriend also hated it, he refused to use it past a week.   Bamboo holders: 0/5 There are better bar soap holders. Mine began developing mold because the design of it does not allow for it to dry all the way in between showers. The size is way chunkier compared to other bar shampoo/conditioner holders and inconvenient, I feel like a tin would be more appropriate and longer lasting. Definitely not travel friendly, Iu2019d rather use a plastic baggie.   Summary: I would recommend just getting the shampoo, maybe conditioner if you really feel it. I wanted to enjoy this product but I am sad that I do not want to use it again.

reviews.review_title: You donu2019t have to skimp to be sustainable
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the opportunity to try out the Viori Beauty Hair Shampoo & Conditioner Bar with Bamboo Holder Set, complimentary from Viori Beauty in exchange for my honest review, and I must say, I'm thoroughly impressed.  As someone who is conscious about reducing plastic waste and searching for more sustainable hair care options, this set has exceeded my expectations. First things first, let's talk about the packaging. The shampoo and conditioner bars come in a beautifully designed bamboo holder that not only looks aesthetically pleasing in my bathroom but also serves as a practical way to keep the bars dry and clean. The holder is a secure spot for the bars to rest between uses. I found the bars themselves to be exceptional. The scent matters as each scent is curated for a different hair type. I tried Hidden Waterfall, which is for all hair types. Hidden Waterfall is a musky, sweet, vanilla-scent. The natural, refreshing scent is delightful and not overpowering. The shampoo bar lathers up well, and I was pleasantly surprised by how easily it distributed throughout my hair, leaving it feeling thoroughly cleansed. It rinses out easily too. One of the most impressive aspects is that a single shampoo bar provides up to 30-60 washes!  The conditioner bar is equally impressive. It has a rich and creamy texture that melts effortlessly into my hair, providing deep hydration and leaving it feeling incredibly soft and manageable. I appreciate that it doesn't weigh my hair down, as some traditional liquid conditioners tend to do. The combination of the shampoo and conditioner bars has improved the overall health and appearance of my hair. I've noticed increased shine, reduced frizz, and improved manageability. These bars are clearly formulated with quality ingredients that truly nourish and care for the hair. I highly recommend this set to anyone seeking an eco-friendly, luxurious hair care experience. It delivers exceptional results and is a more sustainable routine.

Thank you to Skeepers and to viori beauty for the free shampoo and conditioner set with a bamboo holder! I was surprised when it arrived at how beautiful it all was, and then when using it, the smell was incredible! I love how unique this product is as well, inspired by the red Yao tribe!

reviews.review_text: I received this set complimentary from Viori Beauty for testing purposes in exchange for my honest review. I have wavy medium length and it was not as convenient as I thought. The shampoo was more workable than the conditioner. After the first use, the shampoo + conditioner combo left my hair dry, heavy and oily. I didn't want to give up, so I used just the shampoo and my hair seemed to get used to it a tad better and used a leave-in conditioner. Honestly, this was not what I expected, so I will stick to my tried and true liquid shampoo from now on. I don't recommend leaving the bars in the bamboo holder in the shower, if you have a drawer that you can put them in after they get dry do so, the holder molds easily.

reviews.review_text: Gifted by Viori Beauty.  Shampoo and conditioner bars by Viori Beauty have worked so much better than I was expecting.  A shampoo & conditioner bar I had tried months ago were so drying on my hair, so my expectations were low for these.  This hair shampoo & conditioner bars come with a bamboo holder.  The packaging on everything is so nice, the conditioner bar looks luxe with it's design.  I put both the bars in the bamboo holder and just leave the lid off, so they both fit that way.  These take up way less room than your traditional shampoo & conditioner bottles.  I am new to the brand Viori Beauty but I am really enjoying these hair bars from them.  I received the Hidden Waterfall scent and it has notes of sandalwood, amber, and jasmine.   I love the scent, it's not over powering and just gives my hair a good smell.  The bars both performed really well.  The shampoo bar really lathers up good.  The conditioner bar also works well, but I do have to take more time working it into my hair.  It does rinse out easy and my hair feels detangled, silky soft.  One thing I did notice is that slight dandruff has developed.  I never had before.  I am thinking something in this is creating it.  I didn't notice right away though but then this is all I have been using and I just started to notice recently.  I'll have to start using and anti-dandruff shampoo in between using these and see if that helps.  That one be my only con is that it has created dandruff for me.  Other than that, I so like them.  Plus they would be easy to travel with.  For being bars they have been lasting long too.
